Reviews.Title: Poor Quality
Reviews.Author: H
Reviews.Content: Poor Quality All The Way Around...Nothing to see here...Move along. As poor a video for the price. No Power Supply,No BNC Adapter. Nice Build However.... but no substance.

ProductInfo.Features:
4-pack of Super High Resolution Color Cameras
Power consumption: max 4 Watts (IR LED on)
LED lighting distance: max 33ft
Auto exposure, white balance, gain control and day and night
Built in microphone for audio monitoring capability
ProductInfo.Name: Revo RCBS20-2BNDL4 450TVL Indoor/Outdoor Bullet Surveillance Cameras with 33-Feet Night Vision (4-Pack)
